benchmark_details.name: Chinese SafetyQA
benchmark_details.overview: Chinese SafetyQA is a short-form factuality benchmark designed to evaluate the safety-related knowledge of large language models (LLMs) in the Chinese context.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To systematically evaluate the factuality ability of LLMs regarding safety knowledge in the Chinese context.

data.source: Data collected from search engine databases, official Chinese websites, and generated by human experts.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are calculated based on the ability of LLMs to correctly answer safety-related questions.
methodology.interpretation: F-score combines the correct answers and attempts, reflecting overall model performance.
methodology.validation: The benchmark has been evaluated across more than 30 large language models.

targeted_risks.harm: Potential risks from inaccuracies in safety knowledge may lead to legal and ethical violations.
